H0.text: In which year did John Stonehouse disappear and the Flixborough chemical plant exploded. 1970

H1.text: In which year did John Stonehouse disappear and the Flixborough chemical plant exploded. 1971

H2.text: In which year did John Stonehouse disappear and the Flixborough chemical plant exploded. 1972

H3.text: In which year did John Stonehouse disappear and the Flixborough chemical plant exploded. 1974

A4.text: Stonehouse faked his death on 20 November 1974, leaving a pile of clothes on a beach in Miami to make it appear that he had suffered a fatal misadventure while swimming.
